LanguageData.VGE_Hunter.label: hunter
LanguageData.VGE_Hunter.description: A fast, human-sized combat mechanoid designed for zero-gravity warfare. It drifts effortlessly through space, closing in on the target before unleashing devastating salvos from the twin-linked javelin launcher. While the missiles strike with lethal precision, their short range forces hunters into dangerous proximity with the enemy.
LanguageData.VGE_Hunter.tools.0.label: голова
